reviewText:
This is a recap of the 2000 500cc Motorcycle Grand Prix season.

If you're like me, a fan of Grand Prix motorcycle racing - now known as MotoGP, it's a great review of the last year an American rider won a championship on a fire-breathing, rubber smokin', strictly built for racing, thoroughbred motorcycle. These were bikes that were insanely difficult to ride, not to mention ride well, and those who did not learn to ride well enough suffered the consequeces.
